OOC: Nice, but this time I'd like the battle to be away from the base. That=
 way, the Mafia and Radicons won't be firing at the base and will concentra=
te on the Chivtrons. Then we'll have a shootfest between them. Unless the C=
hivtrons go back to the base in the middle of the battle, then it would end=
 up a base battle anyway.

BIC: Burning Hammer: Right.

He goes where he's =
supposed to go, in front of the base...

  ::Aerotaur::
     =
 "Interesting.  Lead the way to your holes."  He opens a com to BH and

ambda.  "Burning Hammer, Lambda.  We have an incoming attack.  You are to 
=
  defend the front of the base while we surprise them."  He closes the com =
and 
  looks to Grounded.

  ::Lambda::
      She snaps out of her restless=
 sleep.  She stands and looks around the CR 
  room.  Burning Hammer was no=
 longer in his chamber.  "Burning Hammer?"  She 
  receives the com and hea=
ds to the front of the base.
